apis.name: MarketData
apis.description: The market data API of MyTestExchange, , with only 1 REST endpoint and no websocket endpoint

restEndpoints.name: exchangeInfo
restEndpoints.description: Fetch market information of symbols that can be traded

properties.name: symbols
properties.description: The list of symbol to fetch market information for. Leave empty to fetch all markets

properties.name: payload
properties.description: List of market information for each requested symbol
